trigger_prototype.expression: not ({Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[Cable/Interconnect.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=1 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[Cable/Interconnect.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=6 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[Cable/Interconnect.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=100)
trigger_prototype.name: State of Cable/Interconnect sensor {#SENSOR_NAME} is not Present/Normal/Connected

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[Cooling Device.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=4
trigger_prototype.name: State of Cooling Device sensor {#SENSOR_NAME} is Not redundant

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].nodata(1d)}=0 and {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].nodata(1h)}=1
trigger_prototype.name: No data for an hour from {#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=9 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state2[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=9 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state3[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=9 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state4[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=9 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state5[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=9

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=14 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state2[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=14 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state3[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=14 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state4[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=14 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state5[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=14
trigger_prototype.name: State of {#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME} is Asserted

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=27 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state2[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=27 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state3[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=27 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state4[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=27 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state5[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=27
trigger_prototype.name: State of {#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME} is Bus uncorrectable error

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].diff()}=1 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state2[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].diff()}=1 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state3[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].diff()}=1 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state4[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].diff()}=1 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state5[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].diff()}=1
trigger_prototype.name: State of {#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME} is changed

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=22 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state2[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=22 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state3[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=22 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state4[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=22 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state5[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=22
trigger_prototype.name: State of {#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME} is Correctable memory error logging limit reached

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=29 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state2[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=29 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state3[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=29 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state4[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=29 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state5[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=29
trigger_prototype.name: State of {#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME} is Device disabled

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=18 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state2[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=18 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state3[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=18 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state4[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=18 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state5[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=18

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=17 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state2[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=17 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state3[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=17 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state4[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=17 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state5[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=17
trigger_prototype.name: State of {#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME} is Drive in critical array

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=10 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state2[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=10 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state3[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=10 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state4[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=10 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state5[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=10
trigger_prototype.name: State of {#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME} is Event log full

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=11 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state2[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=11 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state3[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=11 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state4[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=11 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state5[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=11

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=20 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state2[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=20 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state3[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=20 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state4[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=20 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state5[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=20

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=12 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state2[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=12 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state3[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=12 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state4[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=12 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state5[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=12

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=23 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state2[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=23 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state3[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=23 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state4[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=23 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state5[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=23

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=21 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state2[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=21 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state3[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=21 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state4[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=21 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state5[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=21
trigger_prototype.name: State of {#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME} is No bootable media

trigger_prototype.expression: not ({Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=0 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=1 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=2 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=3 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=6 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=7 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=9 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=13 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=14 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=20 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=100)
trigger_prototype.name: State of {#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME} is not good

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=8 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state2[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=8 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state3[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=8 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state4[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=8 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state5[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=8
trigger_prototype.name: State of {#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME} is Predictive failure deasserted

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=13 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state2[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=13 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state3[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=13 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state4[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=13 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state5[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=13
trigger_prototype.name: State of {#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME} is Progress

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=19 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state2[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=19 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state3[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=19 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state4[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=19 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state5[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=19
trigger_prototype.name: State of {#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME} is Rebuild in progress

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=30 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state2[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=30 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state3[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=30 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state4[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=30 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state5[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=30
trigger_prototype.name: State of {#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME} is Scrub failed

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=24 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state2[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=24 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state3[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=24 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state4[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=24 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state5[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=24
trigger_prototype.name: State of {#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME} is Slot/connector installed

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=25 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state2[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=25 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state3[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=25 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state4[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=25 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state5[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=25

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=28 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state2[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=28 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state3[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=28 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state4[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=28 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state5[{#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=28
trigger_prototype.name: State of {#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME} is Uncorrectable error

trigger_prototype.expression: not ({Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[Drive Bay.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=1 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[Drive Bay.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=2 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[Drive Bay.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=100)
trigger_prototype.name: State of Drive Bay sensor {#SENSOR_NAME} is not good

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[Fan.{#SENSOR_NAME}].diff()}=1
trigger_prototype.name: State of Fan sensor {#SENSOR_NAME} is changed

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[Power Supply.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=4 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state2[Power Supply.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=4 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state3[Power Supply.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=4 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state4[Power Supply.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=4 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state5[Power Supply.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=4

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[Power Supply.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=5 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state2[Power Supply.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=5 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state3[Power Supply.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=5 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state4[Power Supply.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=5 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state5[Power Supply.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=5

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[Power Supply.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=15 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state2[Power Supply.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=15 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state3[Power Supply.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=15 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state4[Power Supply.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=15 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state5[Power Supply.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=15
trigger_prototype.name: State of Power Supply sensor {#SENSOR_NAME} is Power off

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[System Firmware.{#SENSOR_NAME}].diff()}=1 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state2[System Firmware.{#SENSOR_NAME}].diff()}=1 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state3[System Firmware.{#SENSOR_NAME}].diff()}=1 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state4[System Firmware.{#SENSOR_NAME}].diff()}=1 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state5[System Firmware.{#SENSOR_NAME}].diff()}=1
trigger_prototype.name: State of System Firmware {#SENSOR_NAME} is changed

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[System Firmware.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=13 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state2[System Firmware.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=13 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state3[System Firmware.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=13 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state4[System Firmware.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=13 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state5[System Firmware.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=13

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[System Firmware.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=9 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state2[System Firmware.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=9 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state3[System Firmware.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=9 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state4[System Firmware.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=9 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state5[System Firmware.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=9
trigger_prototype.name: State of System Firmware {#SENSOR_NAME} is Successful software/firmware change

trigger_prototype.expression: not ({Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[Temperature.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=2 or {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:state1[Temperature.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}=100)
trigger_prototype.name: State of Temperature {#SENSOR_NAME} is not Ok

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template IPMI Pyipmimon:value[Temperature.{#SENSOR_NAME}].last()}>80
trigger_prototype.name: Value of sensor {#SENSOR_TYPE}.{#SENSOR_NAME} on {HOSTNAME} exceeded 80

mapping.newvalue: Correctable memory error logging limit reached
